#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long int

using namespace std;

ll choice[5000];


int main(){
	ll t,i,n,c;

	double ans;

	scanf("%lld",&t);

	while(t--){
		scanf("%lld",&n);
       
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
			cin>>choice[i];

        c=0;

		for(i=1;i<n;i++){
            if(choice[i]==-1)
            	c++;
		}
		ans=1.00000000+c*0.500000;
		printf("%0.8f\n",ans);
	}
	return 0;
}
